title: Tech Rout Sends S&P 500 Down 1%; Oracle, Broadcom Stoke AI Angst
description: A rotation out of technology stocks gained momentum Friday after disappointing earnings from Broadcom Inc. and anxiety about the completion dates for some of Oracle Corp.’s data centers renewed worries about the artificial-intelligence trade.
content: A rotation out of technology stocks gained momentum Friday after disappointing earnings from Broadcom Inc. and anxiety about the completion dates for some of Oracle Corp.’s data centers renewed worries about the artificial-intelligence trade.
